Traveller

Hello, I am Satya

24 yaer old coder, have descent knowledge on Data Structure, Algorithm, Competitve Programming, Web development an aspiring Data Scientist and still learning Machine Learning.

What Describes Me?

I am not borned to please others, I borend to have a meanig full life, be loyal to my work, do what ever i like and make sure it does not affect to the socity or environment, Love my family and most importantly travel and live in an adventorus Lifestyle

Work

My work is going to fill a large part of my life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what I believe is great work.

Happiness

Happiness is when what I think, what I say, and what I do are in harmony.

Adventure

It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
